dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your tarot business activities.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage your client bookings and schedule.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Appointment
schedule.step1_desc: Select a client for this appointment.
schedule.step2_desc: Choose the services for this session.
schedule.step3_desc: Pick a date and time for the appointment.
schedule.summary_desc: Please review the details before confirming.
schedule.success_toast_desc: Appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been booked.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: Manage your client roster and view their history.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for the new client.
add.success_toast_desc: The new client has been added to your roster.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

reading.title: AI Reading Session
reading.description: Start a new tarot reading session for a client.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards represent past, present, and future.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... Please wait.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The connection to the ethereal plane was lost. Please try again.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: An overview of the tarot reading services you offer.
services.desc_general: A broad overview of your current energies. Perfect for clients without a specific question.
services.desc_love: Romantic relationships (partner, ex, potential). Love energy, loyalty, relationship future. Suitable for those in new relationships, LDRs, or conflicts.
services.desc_career: Career direction, job choices, business opportunities. Suitable for those contemplating resignation, interviews, or promotions.
services.desc_finance: Financial energy, opportunities for prosperity, expenses, investments. Can be combined with actionable advice.
services.desc_spiritual: Aura, karma, past life, and inner energy readings. Suitable for those needing self-reflection or emotional healing.
services.desc_yesno: A direct answer to one specific question. Quick and simple, suitable for express services.
services.desc_timed: Weekly, monthly, or yearly energy forecast. Predictions for a specific period.
services.desc_ppf: Highlights the past, current situation, and future predictions.
services.desc_soulmate: Soul connections, spiritual relationships, destined partners.
services.desc_chakra: Assesses the balance of the body's energy or chakras.

pricing.title: Price List
pricing.description: A general price list for tarot reading services in Indonesia.
pricing.table_description: Prices are estimates and may vary based on the factors below.

factors.experience: Experience: The more famous or experienced the reader, the higher the rate.
factors.media: Consultation Media: Offline (face-to-face) readings are usually more expensive.
factors.complexity: Number of Questions/Spreads: The more complex, the higher the price.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: View and manage your public tarot master profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application and service settings.

specializations.title: Service Specializations
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you offer to clients.

durations.title: Session Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Define the available session lengths and their corresponding prices.

payment.title: Payment Settings
payment.description: Manage the payment methods available to your clients.
